attributes.action: Oppose the gate closures to Regent's Park proposed by the Cycle Super Highway 11
attributes.background: This proposal together with the diversion for HS2 in the Camden area will cause severe traffic congestion in all the residential roads surrounding Regent's Park and St John's Wood.  This will have an enormous impact on local residents and their communities and will affect many small businesses.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
